Music.join: `{0}join` - let the bot join your voice channel
Music.skip: `{0}skip` - skip the song that is currently playing
Music.search: `{0}search <song>` - list the first search results to select which one you want to hear
Music.remove: `{0}remove (all|<index>)` - remove the song from the queue or clear it
Music.np: `{0}np` - show information about the song that is currently playing
Music.playingmessages: `{0}playingmessages (enable|disable)` - enable or disable messages telling you when a new song starts playing

uncategorized.language: `{0}langauge (get|list|set <language>)` - get or set the language the bot should use on this server (alias: `lang`)

help: `{0}about` - show some information about the bot

info.title: Hi, I am l0c4lb0t
content: I am l0c4lb0t - a multi purpose bot made by {1}.

The goal of this bot is to replace all moderation bots. How I want to achieve this? My goal is to have every moderation feature you might need, thus destroying the need to have multiple bots of that kind.

Having only one bot for moderation is a big improvement. You only need to know one prefix, there are no two bots with the same prefix and your member list is not flooded with bots you only use once in a while.

Of course, achieving this goal is very hard and this is the part I need to ask you for help. If you think there is a feature missing, give the `{0}botsuggestion` command a try. Suggest the feature you need and wait until you can finally kick the bot with that feature, because you don't need it anymore!

While the goal is to have all features needed for a moderation bot, I am still very open about features that are not for moderating your server. Just suggest whatever you want. (I won't add any roleplay features though. I think there are way too many possibilities and ideas you can implement in a roleplay bot, that I don't want to start adding them. There are many other bots for roleplay that you can use instead and fit your needs better than a roleplay feature in this bot.)
If you like this bot and you want to support me, please consider [becoming a patron](https://patreon.com/l0c4lh057).

help: `{0}anticaps minlength (get|set <length>)` - get or set the length the message content has to have to be filtered
`{0}anticaps mincaps (get|set <percent>)` - get or set how many capital characters are required to filter messages
`{0}anticaps delete (get|set (true|false))` - get or set whether messages that exceed the limit should get deleted
`{0}anticaps warning (get|set <warning>|remove)` - get, set or remove the warning that should get sent
`{0}ban <user>` - ban a user
`{0}ban <user> <reason>` - ban a user with a reason

calc.help:
`{0}calc <expression>` - calculate the result of the expression

[mXparser](https://mathparser.org/) is used to calculate expressions. You can use all [expressions and functions that library is capable of](https://mathparser.org/mxparser-math-collection/).

error.title: Error

help: `{0}cat` - send a random picture of a cat
`{0}choose <option1> <option2> [<moreOptions>...]` - choose one of the options you gave
`{0}dog` - send a random picture of a dog
`{0}dynamicvoicechannel list` - list all channel names that are used
`{0}dynamicvoicechannel add <channelName>` - add a new channel to be affected
`{0}dynamicvoicechannel remove <channelName>` - remove the channel from the list of affected channels
Alias: `dvc`
`{0}help` - send the help message
`{0}help <pageNumber>` - send the help message on the given page
`{0}help <command>` - send the help message of a command
`{0}kick <user>` - kick a user
`{0}kick <user> <reason>` - kick a user with a reason
`{0}language get` - show the language currently used and all available languages
`{0}language set <language>` - change the language

notFound.title: Language not found
notFound.content: The language `{0}` could not be found. Please use `{1}language get` to show all available languages

help: `{0}minesweeper <width> <height> <bombCount>` - create a game of minesweeper
Be careful to not explode!
`{0}prefix set <newPrefix>` - change the bot's prefix
`{0}remind <duration> <reason>` - remind you of something important
A valid duration can be `42` which will be interpreted as minutes but also something like `5h2min52s` (the order is not important).
For important reminders it is recommended to not use the bot. Reminders are not stored, thus when the bot restarts all reminders are cancelled.

set.title: Reminder set
set.content:
Your will get reminded in {0} for the following reason:
```{1}```

invalidDuration.title: Invalid duration
invalidDuration.content: The duration has to be between one minute and two days. Your selected duration {0} does not follow this rule.

help: `{0}token get` - get the token to [customize the settings online](https://l0c4lh057.jg-p.eu/l0c4lb0t/dashboard/)
`{0}token new (edit|readonly)` - renew the token to be sure nobody has access to it anymore
**Warning:** The guild token is very powerful. Only the server owner can get and renew it. Don't share it with anyone you don't trust 150%!
